techmeme.title: Creatio, which offers a no-code CRM and workflow automation platform, raised $200M led by Sapphire Ventures at a $1.2B valuation (Frederic Lardinois/TechCrunch)
Data connectivity software provider CData raised ~$350M led by Warburg Pincus, source says at a $800M+ valuation, and says it expects $100M in ARR by 2024 end (Reuters)
Kaiko: spot bitcoin ETFs' launch in the US helped Bybit double its market share to 16% in March, crossing Coinbase to become the world's second-largest exchange (Benjamin Taubman/Bloomberg)
Sensi, which uses AI to analyze audio and let home care agencies virtually monitor seniors, raised a $31M Series B, bringing its total funding to $53M (Marina Temkin/TechCrunch)
Seven content-licensing sellers of music, image, and other AI training datasets form the Dataset Providers Alliance to advocate for "ethical data sourcing" (Katie Paul/Reuters)
